backend/main.mo: Defines the Ribbit canister’s state, maps, and data types for ponds, posts, ribbits, users, tags, likes, activity, and blob storage.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a phrase-hash membership feature and its related files, components, and test references.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-like text listing concise summaries for multiple frontend files including components and pages.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Markdown guide explaining prerequisites and steps for deploying the Ribbit app to the Internet Computer.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining the root container and loading the main frontend script.
frontend/scripts/combined-update.sh: Shell script that generates backend bindings, builds the frontend, and deploys canisters in a single update pipeline.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring routes, global layout, theme provider, and automatic Froggy Phrase initialization.
frontend/src/components/BookmarkButton.t: Bookmark toggle button component that uses bookmark state to visually indicate and change bookmark status for a lily.
frontend/src/components/CommentItem.tsx: Displays a comment with avatar, timestamp, content, and optional like and reply actions.
frontend/src/components/EmojiReactions.t: Renders emoji-based reactions with counts and selection/hover states, allowing users to react to content.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer with navigation links and attribution displaying a heart icon and caffeine.ai link.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top navigation bar with search, avatar menu, logo handling, and mobile/desktop search behavior.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Page layout wrapper that renders header, footer, main content, and manages the mobile sidebar drawer.
frontend/src/components/LeftSidebar.tsx: Sidebar with navigation links and recent activity list, including active-route highlighting.
frontend/src/components/LilyCard.tsx: Card UI for displaying a lily post with metadata, counts, like/share actions, and optional avatar/tags.
frontend/src/components/LilyImageFrame.t: Image frame that enforces a 4:3 area and adds a blurred backdrop for non‑4:3 images.
frontend/src/components/MobileLeftSideba: Mobile-only sliding drawer that shows the left sidebar and locks body scroll when open.
frontend/src/components/PondAboutSidebar: Sidebar showing pond details, stats, moderators, and join/leave controls with loading states.
frontend/src/components/PondCardJoinCont: Join button for pond cards with disabled state and toast feedback for join attempts.
frontend/src/components/PondMobileHeader: Mobile header for a pond showing banner, profile image, name, description, and tab navigation for feed and about sections.
frontend/src/components/PostCard.tsx: Displays a post with voting controls, metadata, content preview, optional image, tag badge, and comment/view counts.
frontend/src/components/ProfileRibbitIte: Renders a user’s ribbit on their profile with avatar, linked post title, timestamp, content, and link to the conversation.
Emoji picker popover that lets users insert predefined emojis into ribbits.
frontend/src/components/RibbitItem.tsx: Displays an individual ribbit with nesting, avatar, timestamp, content, like button, and a reply form with submission logic.
frontend/src/components/RibbitMiniBlurAv: Handles blurred placeholder loading for avatar images with smooth transition, supporting avatar and img modes.
frontend/src/components/RightSidebar.tsx: Right sidebar showing trending ponds, popular tags, and recent popular posts with loading states.
frontend/src/components/search/MobileSea: Implements a full‑screen mobile search modal showing trending terms, suggestions, and a search input with callbacks.
frontend/src/components/search/SearchDro: Renders a dropdown under the search bar displaying trending searches or suggestions based on query state.
frontend/src/components/TagHubRightSideb: Sidebar module for tag statistics displaying top, trending, and newest tags using shared components and loading states.
frontend/src/components/UnderlineTabs.ts: Provides styled tab list and trigger components that wrap base Tabs primitives with underline-specific classes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the user’s identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBookmarks.ts: Manages bookmarked lily IDs in localStorage, providing helpers to add, remove, toggle, and read bookmarks.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebounce.ts: Returns a debounced version of a value that updates after a specified delay.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, stored identity loading, and auth client setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useMediaQuery.ts: Evaluates a CSS media query and returns whether it currently matches, updating on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains React Query hooks for fetching and mutating pond, user, and search-related data via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind layers, theme variables for light and dark mode, and adds utility classes for UI styling.
frontend/src/lib/formatNumber.ts: Formats large numbers into shortened k/M/B notation with simple rounding.
frontend/src/lib/froggyPhraseWordList.ts: Exports frog-related terms and a large word list used for generating Froggy Phrase identifiers.
frontend/src/lib/imageCompression.ts: Provides client-side image validation, resizing, and compression with special handling for animated GIFs.
frontend/src/lib/pondNameValidation.ts: Validates and normalizes pond names to strict alphanumeric format and returns error messages.
frontend/src/lib/pondRank.ts: Sorts ponds by lily count, member count, and name, returning a map of pond names to ranks.
frontend/src/lib/shareLily.ts: Shares a lily link using the Web Share API with clipboard and textarea fallbacks plus toast notifications.
frontend/src/lib/tagValidation.ts: Validates and normalizes tags as alphanumeric strings and returns optional error messages.
frontend/src/lib/user.ts: Manages usernames, user IDs, settings backup, and 12‑word Froggy Phrase generation and storage.
frontend/src/lib/viewCountCooldown.ts: Tracks per‑lily cooldown timestamps in localStorage to prevent frequent view count increments.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Static about page describing the platform, its features, and community guidelines using styled UI sections.
frontend/src/pages/AllPondsPage.tsx: Lists all ponds with ranks, join controls, and loading states, allowing users to browse or start ponds.
frontend/src/pages/CreateLilyPage.tsx: Form for creating a new lily with support for text, image, or link posts, tag suggestions, image compression, and pond selection.
frontend/src/pages/CreatePondPage.tsx: Form for creating a pond with name validation, description, optional images with compression, and submission handling.
frontend/src/pages/CreatePostPage.tsx: Page for creating a post with selectable type, image compression, pond selection, validation, and submission flow.
frontend/src/pages/FrogProfilePage.tsx: Displays a user's profile, avatar, posts, and comments with loading and not-found states using tabbed navigation.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Shows the main feed of lilies with sorting, search integration, sidebars, and loading skeletons.
frontend/src/pages/LilyPage.tsx: Renders a single lily post, its metadata, ribbits, likes, views, and allows creating ribbits with view-count tracking.
frontend/src/pages/PondAboutPage.tsx: Displays pond details, moderators, metadata, and join/leave actions with loading and not-found handling.
frontend/src/pages/PondPage.tsx: Shows a pond’s lily feed with sorting, sidebars, banner, and loading/not-found states.
frontend/src/pages/PostPage.tsx: Displays a single post with metadata, image/link content, and threaded comments, and allows users to submit new comments. Fetches post and ribbits, handles sorting, and shows loading or not-found states.
frontend/src/pages/SavedLiliesPage.tsx: Shows locally bookmarked lilies, rendering each via SavedLilyItem with loading and unavailable states. Allows users to remove bookmarks stored in browser storage.
frontend/src/pages/TagHubPage.tsx: Provides a hub listing top, trending, and newest tags with stats, using tabs and sidebars. Fetches tag data and displays tag items with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/TagPage.tsx: Displays lilies for a specific tag with sorting, canonical tag redirection, and subcategories. Includes sidebars and handles loading states and tag metadata.
frontend/src/pages/UserSettingsPage.tsx: Renders user settings including username management, avatars, ponds, profile data, admin tools, and cooldown checks. Handles profile saving, username validation, and various asynchronous mutations.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Defines Tailwind CSS configuration, extending theme colors, animations, container settings, and plugin setup. Customizes color tokens and component styling variables.
project_state.json: Tracks the project’s shift from principal-based to Froggy Phrase hash–based identity, outlining required authorization removals and related feature requests. Highlights issues with anonymous access and lists ongoing work to fix permission and membership logic.
